```{bash}
source bioinf_config_inclass.sh

mkdir -p $STAROUT_DIR
ls $OUT_DIR
```

```{bash}
ls -ltr $TRIM_DIR
```

```{bash}
STAR \
    --runMode alignReads \
    --twopassMode None \
    --genomeDir $GENOME_DIR \
    --readFilesIn $TRIM_DIR/SRR12804464_1_trimmed.fastq.gz \
    --outFileNamePrefix ${STAROUT_DIR}/SRR12804464_1_ \
    --readFilesCommand gunzip -c \
    --quantMode GeneCounts \
    --outSAMtype BAM SortedByCoordinate \
    --outSAMunmapped Within \
    --runThreadN $TOTAL_THREADS
```

```{bash}
ls $STAROUT_DIR
```

```{bash}
head $STAROUT_DIR/*.out
```

```{bash}
multiqc $QC $STAROUT_DIR --outdir $STAROUT_DIR
```

```{bash}
echo $STAROUT_DIR
```
